comments: It seems that for n>1 a(n+1)<2*a(n). Does lim n -> infinity a(n+1)/a(n)=2? - _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 18 2002Smallest number m such that the abundancy-index of m! is at least n.Floor[Sigma[m! ]/m! ] = n; note that abundancy-index [= sigma(u)/u] here is not necessarily an integer.
